column3:
『リトの巨塔の黒き体
日の高き時真の心の在り処を示す』

リトの村人ベラから聞いた この詩には
どうやら続きがあるようだ…

ベラの姉ソリレスが
詩の続きを知っているそうだが…
column4:
\"The pride of the Rito, pillar in the sky,
its heart lights up, when the sun is high.\"

It seems there is more to these lyrics than 
you heard from Bedoli in the Rito Village.

Apparently Bedoli's sisterLaissaknows
the last half of the song.

column3:
『リトの巨塔の黒き体
日の高き時真の心の在り処を示す
 しかして心は眠りの中
熱き炎が その魂を目覚めさせん』

リトの村の詩にまつわる
新たな祠の入口を発見した！
column4:
\"The pride of the Rito, pillar in the sky,
its heart lights up when the sun is high.
The heart shines upon a path not whole,
but a warming flame can stir its soul.\"

The lyrics in the ancient song from the
Rito Village were actually a clue to lead to
the entrance of a shrine!

column3:
ベラの姉ソリレスから詩の続きを聞いた

『リトの巨塔の黒き体
日の高き時真の心の在り処を示す
 しかして心は眠りの中
熱き炎が その魂を目覚めさせん』

この詩に隠された謎とは…？
column4:
You have heard the rest of the ancient Rito
song from Bedoli's sister, Laissa.

\"The pride of the Rito, pillar in the sky,
its heart lights up when the sun is high.
The heart shines upon a path not whole,
but a warming flame can stir its soul.\"

What is themeaning hidden in these lyrics?
